text: was a Japanese photographer. He was well-known for having photographed the covers for John Lennon and Yoko Ono's albums, Double Fantasy and Milk and Honey. Shinoyama died on January 4, 2024 in Tokyo, Japan at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Japanese photographers Category:Artists from Tokyo
title: Kishin Shinoyama
